name: Momodora II
summary:
MOMODORA II is the second installment in the Momodora series.

This sequel is much more polished and improved in every aspect in comparison with the first Momodora. It also abandoned the previous arcade-like progression for some gameplay that focuses slightly more on exploration.

Momodora II follows the story of Momo, a priestess who is on a mission to banish evil nearby her home village
info:
• 中文名: 桃与多拉 2
  • 游戏类型: 平台游戏，动作
  • 发行日期: 2014年7月24日
  • 官方网站: https://rdein.itch.io/momodora-ii
